title: Recoverable Streaming Joins on Shopping Cart Data
description: Learn the basics of recovering stateful dataflows.

title: Building Sessions from Search Logs
description: A basic example of using Bytewax to turn an incoming stream of event logs from a hypothetical search engine into metrics over search sessions.

title: Analyzing the Coinbase Order Book in Real-Time
description: Connect to webhooks, and aggregate incoming events to maintain an order book in real-time.
